clusterList.phrase: nobody can question my loyalty towards the gorkhaland demand during the 1986 agitation the party removed me from the general-secretary post of pradesh congress committee because i supported the demand for a separate state i had convinced the then pm rajiv gandhi for a union territory status for darjeeling but gnlf denounced it saying that the status was meant only for tribals and not civilised people of darjeeling gorkhaland would have been achieved by now had we pursued the union territory status
